modName: All skills to 100 and all perks and more _Customizable_
summary: WARNING: This mod will give you all skills to 100, all perks and more OP goodies. *Customizable*
descriptionHtml:
Sets all skills to 100,
Gives all perks,
Adds all spells (NOT the ones from PSB cheat),
Adds all shouts and 100 dragonsouls to unlock them,
Adds 1 lockpick ( You only need 1 with the "unbrakable" perk)
Adds 10000000 Gold,
Sets health-magicka-stamina to 5000 [color=#cc0000]//Read below if you don't want this or any other of the features or to modify the file[/color]

Usefull if you are going to make a OP char and dont want to waste time at the console.
If you got a Bat file request just write it in the comments. I'll start uploading more when i know what you people need.

In game- Open your console and write:
bat godlike
OR
Bat godlike+50, Bat Godlike+81 depending on what file ya use :) [color=#ffff00][size=4][size=3][color=#ffffff]To change the level just edit a setlevel to desired level in the file.[/color][/size][/size][/color]
Does not give you any mod perks or DLC perks like vampire or werewolf perks from Dawnguard DLC.

All of the commands was taken from [color=#1e84cc][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com]http://elderscrolls.wikia.com[/url][color=#ffffff] with the exeption of the ones i knew from the top of my head (all but the spells and shouts lol) [/color][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]You can also modify the textfile youself to suit yourself so[color=#0000ff] [color=#900000][u][size=6]no need[/size][/u][/color][/color] to contact me about that ok plz <3
[size=3][color=#ffffff]To do this just open the file and remove/add what lines you want. For example if you don't want the extra HP just remove the
player.setav health 5000 or add something else like 10000 iron daggers by adding a player.additem XXXXX line. Hell i don't really give a poopsmooch do what you want Obama.
[/color][/size][/size][/color]
author: Jonkis
